explains: vt. 整理；改组；重新制定

sentences.en: It is the mother who is expected to reorganize her busy schedule.
sentences.cn: 应该让妈妈来重新安排她繁忙的日程。

sentences.en: Once you create a component, you cannot reorganize it into sub-components.
sentences.cn: 一旦你创建了一个构件，就不能将其重新组织为子组件。

sentences.en: We'd have to reorganize the whole company.
sentences.cn: 我们必须重新整顿整个公司。
